mapper.sql: a.m_id AS "mId", a.mname AS "mname", a.meducation AS "meducation", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.mduty AS "mduty", a.asset_mgt_scale AS "assetMgtScale", a.is_public_placement AS "isPublicPlacement", a.investment_years AS "investmentYears", a.mimage AS "mimage", a.target_url AS "targetUrl", a.target_code AS "targetCode", a.fund_id AS "fundId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ts_fund_member a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ts_fund_member( mname, meducation, org_id, mduty, asset_mgt_scale, is_public_placement, investment_years, mimage, target_url, target_code, fund_id, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{mname}, #{meducation}, #{orgId}, #{mduty}, #{assetMgtScale}, #{isPublicPlacement}, #{investmentYears}, #{mimage}, #{targetUrl}, #{targetCode}, #{fundId}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ts_fund_member SET mname = #{mname}, meducation = #{meducation}, org_id = #{orgId}, mduty = #{mduty}, asset_mgt_scale = #{assetMgtScale}, is_public_placement = #{isPublicPlacement}, investment_years = #{investmentYears}, mimage = #{mimage}, target_url = #{targetUrl}, target_code = #{targetCode}, fund_id = #{fundId}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE m_id = #{mId}
